title: Client extremely bad audio

embed.description: Enjoy the videos and music you love, upload original content, and share it all with friends, family, and the world on YouTube.

body: This is something I want to fix really bad, I have friends that record their clips and everything is okay with theirs but whenever I play mine I get this bad audio and graphics issues. I would appreciate if someone could help me fix this issue so I can record clips without my ears bleeding.

replies.body:
Yeouch you weren't kidding! 

This kind of playback screeching can happen sometimes if you have some kind of program running in the background that can record playbacks or add overlays to the game. Let's be sure none of those are running first. If the noise is still there after that, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will be able to look closer.
